Cheap Hotels near Gare du Nord, Paris

Paris’ Gare du Nord is one of the busiest rail stations in Europe, and one of Paris’ most important public transport hubs. Accessible from rue Dunkerque, the area around Gare du Nord rail station is an ideal location for finding cheap hotels and other accommodation in Paris, with metro, RER and both national and international rail connections close by. Built in 1864, it preserves the charm of historic rail stations, despite undergoing renovation work throughout its history. If you need a cheap hotel, hostel or apartment in Paris close to Gare du Nord rail station, make sure you check out our range of accommodation. You’ll spend much less than you think.
